skills.skill: High School Diploma or GED Equivalent

duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing food per recipes/production sheets and setting up in a designated area per department standards.
Taking food temperatures recording on appropriate logs and noting any actions taken to correct.
Cleaning and sanitizing per department standards.
Participating in the department and hospital performance improvement activities.
Participating in the team and/or department meetings.
Complying with hospital/department policies and procedures including all food safety regulatory standards.
Plating and serving prepared food for patient tray delivery.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or GED equivalent
